A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought it was a very original take on the franchise with plenty of  stunning action\, emotional twists\, and unexpected plot lines. Ignore the negative reviewers who will nitpick every little detail about the film. Johnson is clearly a passionate filmmaker who took alot of risks and gave us a very satisfying experience that is totally worth the price of admission. 5 stars\, and I am someone who made it to the theater for the original trilogy.
